name: SVG Path Extractor
description: Extract path data effortlessly from your SVG files for node customization. Using the extracted path, you can define intricate shapes.

name: Shadow Designer
description: Streamlines the shadow creation process, allowing users to add depth and emphasis to their designs with ease.

name: Pixel-to-EM Converter
description: Effortlessly transition from fixed pixel values to flexible "em" units in your CSS.

name: Gradient Designer
description: This is a simple copy / paste from the gradient designer.

name: CSS Playground
description: A tool designed for previewing and developing JavaFX stylesheets, allowing users to overlay multiple stylesheets on the modena theme.
